component.name: Lunacy
component.summary: Graphic design for UI/UX and web

description.p: Next-gen vector graphic design app that combines the best features of other design apps to help you optimize your workflow and minimize distractions. Take advantage of the built-in graphics library, use powerful AI tools, and collaborate on projects with your team on several platforms simultaneously! Lunacy also offers cross-app format support, offline use, and cloud storage.

ul.li: 100% free for both personal and commercial use
AI routine-killers: remove backgrounds, enhance images, create placeholder text, generate avatars
Collaborate in real-time with comments, stickers, and audio messages
Design unique experiences with Auto Layout, Arc Editor, Auto Z-index, automatic shape coloring, and linked web design
Stunning graphic assets with 1.3M icons, 140K photos, and 71K illustrations

description.p: Boundless import and export: work with Figma and Sketch projects, transform your designs into CSS code, or export assets in PNG, SVG, JPEG, PDF, WEBP, TIFF, GIF, and ICO formats in any resolution.
